sentences.english: Kenai residents know firsthand the challenges that follow a natural disaster.
sentences.chinese: 肯奈居民從親身經驗知道天災之後出現的困難。

sentences.english: The newspapers called the earthquake an act of God.
sentences.chinese: 報紙上稱那次地震爲天災。

sentences.english: The restless scourge will become a even greater threat to this world.
sentences.chinese: 無止盡的天災軍團對這個世界的挾制會越來越大。

sentences.english: Not only is our poor Planet Earth suffering from natural calamities, it is battered by man-made disASters AS well.
sentences.chinese: 現今可憐的地球不僅是天災頻仍，人禍更是接踵不斷。

sentences.english: Thanks to either manmade or natural dangers, animals often lose limbs.
sentences.chinese: 動物經常在天災人禍中弄得肢體殘缺不全。

sentences.english: How will the Chief Executive handle natural or man-made disasters?
sentences.chinese: 行政長官應該如何應對和處理天災人禍？

sentences.english: The question remains why southern Africa has been ravaged so frequently by humanitarian emergencies over the past decade or so.
sentences.chinese: 爲甚麼非洲南部在過去十年會頻受天災破壞？

sentences.english: Earth suffering from natural calamities, it is battered by man-made disASters AS well.
sentences.chinese: 現今可憐的地球不僅是天災頻仍，人禍更是接踵不斷。

sentences.english: Vengeance on the Scourge is the only way to ease your pain.
sentences.chinese: 向天災復仇是減輕你痛苦的獨一方法。

sentences.english: The law holds no man responsible for the act of god.
sentences.chinese: 法令劃定人毋爲天災人負責。

sentences.english: The face of natural disasters, we have the people is unwise.
sentences.chinese: 面對天災，我們更該是有智之人。

sentences.english: Due to natural calamities and man-made misfortunes, garden was once depression.
sentences.chinese: 後因天災人禍，花園又一度蕭條。

sentences.english: We fought off the effects of this natural calamity and wrested a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 我們努力消除天災造成的影響，奪得了好收成。

sentences.english: Mehlar crushes the scourgestones into a pile of rubble.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉把這些天災石碾成一堆碎片。

sentences.english: A nature disaster and man-made disaster.
sentences.chinese: 他的命真苦，遭遇了這樣的天災人禍。
